mini biography: 'Benedict Wong' (qv) was born in 1970 in Manchester, England. He is an actor and writer, known for _Doctor Strange (2016)_ (qv), _Avengers: Infinity War (2018)_ (qv) and _The Martian (2015)_ (qv).::Anonymous
trivia: Frequently appears in space-themed movies. As of 2015, has appeared in four of them: _Sunshine (2007)_ (qv), _Moon (2009)_ (qv), _Prometheus (2012)_ (qv) and _The Martian (2015)_ (qv).
His parents emigrated from Hong Kong to the UK via Ireland.
Took a two-year performing arts course at Salford City College.
Worked as an usher at Manchester's now defunct Green Room Theatre.
